certificate_title: QCAL Complete Formalization of Riemann Hypothesis

theorem_statement.name: Riemann Hypothesis
theorem_statement.statement: ∀ ρ : ℂ, riemannZeta ρ = 0 → in_critical_strip ρ → ρ.re = 1/2
theorem_statement.english: All non-trivial zeros of the Riemann zeta function have real part equal to 1/2
theorem_statement.spanish: Todos los ceros no triviales de la función zeta de Riemann tienen parte real igual a 1/2

proof_strategy: 1. Construct self-adjoint operator H_Ψ with eigenvalues {λₙ}
3. Integrate QCAL constants (f₀, C, C', λ₀)
5. Use self-adjoint spectrum: {λₙ} real and positive

citation.apa: Mota Burruezo, J. M. (2026). QCAL Complete Formalization of Riemann Hypothesis. Instituto de Conciencia Cuántica. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17379721

signature.title: Director, Instituto de Conciencia Cuántica
signature.statement: I certify that this formalization represents a complete and coherent mathematical framework for the Riemann Hypothesis using the QCAL approach, grounded in mathematical realism.
